table.name: vtiger_palaunch
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_palaunch` ( `palaunchid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `plannedaction_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `related_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `recipient_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `sequencer_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `scheduled_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `processed_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `palaunch_status` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`palaunchid`), KEY `plannedaction_id` (`plannedaction_id`), KEY `related_id` (`related_id`), KEY `recipient_id` (`recipient_id`), KEY `sequencer_id` (`sequencer_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_palaunchcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_palaunchcf` ( `palaunchid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`palaunchid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
